Task 3 (9 Marks)

Suggested Time for Task 3: 20 minutes

You need to make an invitation to send to the meeting guests.

You have been given one file and one image to use.

Click the button below to download the Meeting file and Directions Image.

Save both files in your Tasks folder.

Open the Meeting file.

a) Centre the heading. (1 mark)

b) Make the heading bold. (1 mark)

c) Insert the Directions Image. (1 mark)

d) Position the Directions Image under the sub-heading 'Directions'. (1 mark)

e) Add bullets to each of the Details points. (1 mark)

f) Add this text after the bullet points. (1 mark)

Cannot attend? Contact 0374 374 1090

g) Change all text to 16 Point. (1 mark)

h) Change the sub-headings Details and Directions to italics. (1 mark)

Save your finished file.

i) Rename your file to Invitation. (1 mark)

Upload your finished file by using the Upload button below.

When you have finished Task 3 press Next.
